title: Maintenance works on Sengkang LRT system

updates.text: Update: we have completed maintenance works on the Sengkang LRT today and it will be operating as usual tomorrow, Sunday, 23 January 2022.

We will be conducting maintenance works on the Sengkang LRT system this weekend - 22 and 23 January 2022. Train service will operate as usual on one platform while the other will be closed for works. https://t.co/bOhmOZAscL
